questions: What semester are you in?
Which semester are you in?
Which semester are you enrolled in?
What semester are you enrolled in?
questions.instructions: Enter an integer. For example, if you are enrolled in the second semester, please enter 2.

questions: What year are you in?
Which year are you in?
What year are you enrolled in?
Which year are you enrolled in?
questions.instructions: Enter an integer. For example, if you are enrolled in the first year, please enter 1.

questions: What CDL are you enrolled in?
In which CDL are you enrolled?
What is the name of your CDL?
What are the names of the exams you have taken?
Which exam have you already taken?
questions.instructions: Please enter the names of the exam you have taken, separated by commas. If you haven't taken any exam, leave this blank.
